GiveItem.Description: Gives an item to the specified inventory

SetItem.Description: Sets an item at the specificed slot in the inventory

Open.Description: Opens the inventory to the specified player

UpdateInventory.Description: Updates the inventory to display new information

SetMetaTag.Description: Sets the meta tag of the inventory

GetMetaTag.Description: Gets the meta tag of the inventory

GetSize.Description: Gets the size of the inventory

GetSlots.Description: Gets the slots of the inventory that contain an item (Expected to include empty slots in the future)
